_header: O mortal man call to remembrance
_description: De Profundis — eleven 12-line stanzas (ababababbcbc), each with Latin heading

BLHar2252.First Lines:
O Mortall man Call to RemembraunceThe day shalle com þat
                    þu moste nedis dye…
BLHar2252.Last Lines:
…Delyver them oute of paynes mortallAnd we shall remembre this
                    psalme de profundis
BLHar2252.Editions:
Besserman,  Lawrence, Gail Gilman,   and  Victor Weinblatt.  
             “Three Unpublished Middle English Poems from the Commonplace Book of
                John Colyns (B.M. MS Harley 2252).” 
             Neuphilologische Mitteilungen
         71 (1970): 212-38: 222-8.
